name: The Archmage
description: The most powerful wizard in the Dragon Empire, the Archmage is dedicated to the forces of order and civilization.
descriptionJa: ドラゴン帝国で最も強力な魔法使い。秩序と文明の力に捧げられた存在。

name: The Crusader
description: The dark god of war commands armies of dark paladins, anti-paladins, and blackguards.
descriptionJa: 戦争の暗黒神。ダークパラディン、アンチパラディン、ブラックガードの軍を率いる。

name: The Diabolist
description: The Diabolist controls the demons and devils that pour into the world from the Abyss and Hell.
descriptionJa: 奈落と地獄から世界に流れ込む悪魔と魔神を支配する。

name: The Dwarf King
description: The Dwarf King rules the dwarves and their underground kingdoms, and is a staunch ally against the dark.
descriptionJa: ドワーフとその地下王国を統治し、闇に対する強固な同盟者。

name: The Elf Queen
description: The Elf Queen rules the elves and their forests, and is a powerful force for good in the world.
descriptionJa: エルフとその森を統治し、世界における善の強力な力。

name: The Emperor
description: The Emperor rules the Dragon Empire, maintaining order and civilization against the forces of chaos.
descriptionJa: ドラゴン帝国を統治し、混沌の力に対して秩序と文明を維持する。

name: The Great Gold Wyrm
description: The Great Gold Wyrm is the most powerful dragon in the world, dedicated to fighting evil.
descriptionJa: 世界で最も強力なドラゴン。悪と戦うことに捧げられた存在。

name: The High Druid
description: The High Druid is the most powerful druid in the world, dedicated to the forces of nature.
descriptionJa: 世界で最も強力なドルイド。自然の力に捧げられた存在。

name: The Lich King
description: The Lich King is the most powerful undead in the world, dedicated to the forces of death.
descriptionJa: 世界で最も強力なアンデッド。死の力に捧げられた存在。

name: The Orc Lord
description: The Orc Lord commands the orc hordes and is a constant threat to civilization.
descriptionJa: オークの大群を率い、文明への絶え間ない脅威となる存在。

name: The Priestess
description: The Priestess is the most powerful cleric in the world, dedicated to the forces of good.
descriptionJa: 世界で最も強力なクレリック。善の力に捧げられた存在。

name: The Prince of Shadows
description: The Prince of Shadows is the most powerful thief in the world, dedicated to the forces of chaos.
descriptionJa: 世界で最も強力な盗賊。混沌の力に捧げられた存在。

name: The Three
description: The Three are the most powerful evil dragons in the world, dedicated to the forces of chaos and destruction.
descriptionJa: 世界で最も強力な邪悪なドラゴン3体。混沌と破壊の力に捧げられた存在。
